pages.text: All players who participated in modpack development before July 2023 are considered as Developers, and the Developer title will be given proactively. After the official release of the modpack, only players who have made significant positive contributions to the development of the modpack can obtain the Developer title.

When entering the game, a red welcome message will be displayed, and all players on the server will receive it.$(br2)When sending messages in chat, the brackets next to the name will have a special color, just like this: $(br2)$(6)<$()Name$(6)>$() Message
